guides.name: Paul Bunyon
guides.bio: Paul Bunyon is a mighty man with 20 yrs exp on the Salmon River

guides.name: Davy Crocket
guides.bio: Davy Crocket is the king of the wild frontier and in charge of Survial Camp courses.

guides.name: Jack Sparrow
guides.bio: Captain Jack Sparrow's specialty is canoeing and fly fishing.

guides.name: Jaques Costou
guides.bio: Guides all 3 types of boating adventures from raging rapids, to an easy fly fishing from your canoe trip.

guides.name: One-Eyed Willy
guides.bio: If buried treasure ye do seek, join his crew, but beware booby traps, that's what I said, booby traps.

guides.name: John Cena
guides.bio: After a lucrative acting career, John has retired and stays fit rowing your lazy bums down river.
